channel.title: 508 help what means this on adding npc's in npc.cfg?
channel.description:
I see this in npc.cfg in my 503 server folder
// ID LV HP MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD NN ND npc = 50 276 240 25 2 8 90 91 89 92 6 King_Black_Dragon A_fierce_dragon_with_black_scales.
What means the MH? and AT? and WN? and SD? and AD? and BE? and DE and AD? and NN and ND??? What they all means????? And i wan't to know if there is a command on a 508 server that gives you all stats 99 (only if you are an admin) Plz help me with this problem ty :)
